name: Tanah Lot
description: An iconic temple perched on a rocky outcrop overlooking the sea.

name: Ubud Monkey Forest
description: A nature reserve and Hindu temple complex inhabited by hundreds of monkeys.

name: Mount Batur
description: An active volcano that can be climbed for stunning sunrise views.

name: Cox's Bazar
description: The longest natural sea beach in the world, stretching over 120 km along the Bay of Bengal.

name: Sundarbans
description: A vast mangrove forest and UNESCO World Heritage site that is home to the Bengal tiger.
